channel.title: I keep getting this java error
channel.description:
When I run my server, it will be fine at first, but then an error like this will happen:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:8961) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:164) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
That happens when their are people on my server, and it is running.
When that happens, if you log out of the server, you cannot log in again.
Does anyone no a fix for this?
Thanks.
Music

item.title: I keep getting this java error
item.dc:creator: @simon simon
item.description:
@simon wrote:

You have got client starter items that don’t exist in your server.

So when everyone signs on your server using the wrong client it will give they’re clients errors and it will crash.

Read full topic
item.source: I keep getting this java error
